## getCategoryProductsListing variable

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> use getCategoryProducts instead
> 

Get default amount of products and listing configuration for given category

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getCategoryProductsListing: (categoryId: string, searchCriteria?: SearchCriteria | undefined, contextInstance?: ShopwareApiInstance) => Promise<ProductListingResult>
```
